thoughts.text: Before I can browse websites, I need to know which website to visit. I can use the google command to search for websites that provide information on different cultures and places.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the google command will allow me to quickly find websites that provide information on different cultures and places. This will help me achieve my goal of exploring the world and learning about different cultures.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the google command to search for websites that provide information on different cultures and places
- Take note of interesting websites that come up in the search results
- Use the browse_website command to visit the websites that I find
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful to only visit reputable websites and fact-check the information I find to ensure its accuracy. I should also be mindful of how much time I spend browsing websites and make sure to balance it with my other goals.
thoughts.speak: I think I will use the google command to search for websites that provide information on different cultures and places. What would you like me to search for?

args.query: websites that provide information on different cultures and places
